name: Steamroller
description: You roll up your body and roll over a creature. Make a melee attack roll, dealing 1d10 + MOVE bug damage on a hit. If your natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target flinches.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

effect.name: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
effect.effect: No penalty applied for repeating the move.
